Suite.Title: Moz

JsonPath.Title: Canonical URL
JsonPath.HelpText: The canonical form of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Domain authority
JsonPath.HelpText: A normalized 100-point score representing the likelihood of a domain to rank well in search engine results

JsonPath.Title: External equity links
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external equity links to the URL

JsonPath.Title: HTTP status code
JsonPath.HelpText: The HTTP status code recorded by Mozscape for this URL, if available

JsonPath.Title: Links
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of links (equity or nonequity or not, internal or external) to the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Subdomain/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozRank of the URL's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/URL/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozRank of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Page authority
JsonPath.HelpText: A normalized 100-point score representing the likelihood of a page to rank well in search engine results

JsonPath.Title: Time last crawled
JsonPath.HelpText: The time and date on which Mozscape last crawled the URL, returned in Unix epoch format

JsonPath.Title: Title
JsonPath.HelpText: The title of the page

JsonPath.Title: Email address
JsonPath.HelpText: Email address for the page's subdomain. Not CAN-SPAM compliant!

JsonPath.Title: Equity links
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of equity links (internal or external) to the URL

JsonPath.Title: External links
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external links to the URL, including nofollowed links

JsonPath.Title: External links to root domain
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external links to the root domain, including nofollowed links

JsonPath.Title: External links to subdomain
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external links to the subdomain, including nofollowed links

JsonPath.Title: Facebook account
JsonPath.HelpText: Facebook account for the page's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: Google+ account
JsonPath.HelpText: Google+ account for the page's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: Linking C blocks
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of links from the same C class IP addresses

JsonPath.Title: Links to root domain
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of links, including internal and nofollow links, to the root domain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Links to subdomain
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of links (including internal and nofollow links) to the subdomain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/External equity/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The fraction of the URL's MozRank derived solely from external links

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/External equity/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The fraction of the URL's MozRank derived solely from external links

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Root domain/Combined/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The combined MozRank of all pages on the subdomain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Root domain/Combined/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The combined MozRank of all pages on the subdomain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Root domain/External equity/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The fraction, derived solely from external links, of the composite MozRank of all pages on the URL's root domain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Root domain/External equity/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The fraction, derived solely from external links, of the composite MozRank of all pages on the URL's root domain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Root domain/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozRank of the URL's root domain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Root domain/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozRank of the URL's root domain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Subdomain combined/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The combined MozRank of all pages on the root domain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Subdomain combined/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The combined MozRank of all pages on the root domain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Subdomain/External equity/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The fraction, derived solely from external links, of the composite MozRank of all pages on the URL's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Subdomain/External equity/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The fraction, derived solely from external links, of the composite MozRank of all pages on the URL's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/Subdomain/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozRank of the URL's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: MozRank/URL/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozRank of the URL

JsonPath.HelpText: The MozTrust of the root domain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozTrust/Root domain/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozTrust of the root domain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozTrust/Subdomain/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozTrust of the subdomain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozTrust/Subdomain/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozTrust of the subdomain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozTrust/URL/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozTrust of the URL

JsonPath.Title: MozTrust/URL/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The MozTrust of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Root domain
JsonPath.HelpText: The root domain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Root domain external links
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external equity links to the root domain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Root domains linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of root domains with any pages linking to the URL

JsonPath.Title: Root domains linking to root domain
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of root domains with any pages linking to the root domain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Root domains linking to subdomain
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of root domains with at least one link to the subdomain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Spam score
JsonPath.HelpText: Spam score for the page's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: Subdomain external links
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external equity links to the subdomain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Subdomains linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of subdomains with any pages linking to the URL

JsonPath.Title: Subdomains linking to subdomain
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of subdomains with any pages linking to the subdomain of the URL

JsonPath.Title: Twitter handle
JsonPath.HelpText: Twitter handle for the page's subdomain

JsonPath.Title: Subdomain
JsonPath.HelpText: The subdomain of the URL

Fetch.Fetch.Url:
@{ long expires = DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(5).UnixTimeStampUtc(); string signature = Utils.UrlEncode(Utils.HmacSha1((Model.AccessId+"\n"+expires), Model.SecretKey)); }
http://lsapi.seomoz.com/linkscape/links/@(Utils.UrlEncode(Model.Url))?
SourceCols=@BitFlagsByGroup("Source") &TargetCols=@BitFlagsByGroup("Target") &LinkCols=@BitFlagsByGroup("Link")
&Scope=@(Model.Scope) &Sort=@(Model.Sort)
@(string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.SourceDomain) ? "" : "&SourceDomain=" + Model.SourceDomain) @(string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.Filter) ? "" : "&Filter=" + Model.Filter)
&Limit=@(Model.PageCursor.NextTake) &Offset=@(Model.PageCursor.NextSkip)
&AccessID=@(Model.AccessId) &Expires=@(expires) &Signature=@(signature)

JsonPath.Title: Link/AnchorText
JsonPath.HelpText: The anchor text of the link, excluding markup

JsonPath.Title: Link/MozRank passed/Normalized
JsonPath.HelpText: The amount of MozRank passed by the link.

JsonPath.Title: Link/MozRank passed/Raw
JsonPath.HelpText: The amount of MozRank passed by the link.

JsonPath.Title: Link/No follow
JsonPath.HelpText: The link has a rel=nofollow directive (non-equity).

JsonPath.Title: Link/Same subdomain
JsonPath.HelpText: The link is between two pages on the same domain.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Meta refresh
JsonPath.HelpText: The link is a meta refresh from the source page to the target.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Same IP address
JsonPath.HelpText: The link is between two pages hosted on the same IP address, strongly indicating a potential administrative relationship between the two.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Same C-block
JsonPath.HelpText: The link is between two pages hosted on the same C Block of IP addresses, indicating a potential administrative relationship between the two.

JsonPath.Title: Link/301 redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: The source page returned a 301 redirect, indicating that the resource was available on the target.

JsonPath.Title: Link/302 redirect
JsonPath.HelpText: The source page returned a 302 redirect, indicating that the resource was temporarily available on the target.

JsonPath.Title: Link/No script
JsonPath.HelpText: The link was located within a noscript HTML block. The link may not be visible to users using javascript.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Off screen
JsonPath.HelpText: The link likely appears offscreen and may not have be visible to most users.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Meta no follow
JsonPath.HelpText: The link appeared on a page using a page-level (meta) nofollow directive. This link passes no juice.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Same root domain
JsonPath.HelpText: The link is between two pages on the same root domain. The link is internal, and strongly indicates an administrative relationship between the two pages.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Img
JsonPath.HelpText: The link includes an img tag.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Feed auto-discovery
JsonPath.HelpText: The link indicates a syndication feed (for example, RSS) for the source page.

JsonPath.Title: Link/Rel canonical
JsonPath.HelpText: The link indicates a canonical form of the page using the rel=canonical directive .

JsonPath.Title: Link/Via 301
JsonPath.HelpText: The source page links to another URL with a 301 redirect to the target page.

RestConnector.Title: Anchor texts

Item.Title: Term to page
Item.HelpText: Returns terms found in links to the target URL

Item.Title: Term to subdomain
Item.HelpText: Returns terms found in links to the subdomain of the target URL

Item.Title: Term to domain
Item.HelpText: Returns terms found in links to the root domain of the target URL

JsonPath.Title: Term or Phrase
JsonPath.HelpText: The anchor text term or phrase

JsonPath.Title: Internal pages linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of internal pages on a root domain linking to the target URL with this term or phrase

JsonPath.Title: Internal subdomains linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of subdomains on the same root domain with at least one link to the target URL containing this term or phrase

JsonPath.Title: External pages linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external pages linking to the target URL containing this term or phrase

JsonPath.Title: External subdomains linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external subdomains with at least one link to the target URL containing this term or phrase

JsonPath.Title: External root domains linking
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of external root domains with at least one link to the target URL containing this term or phrase

JsonPath.Title: Internal MozRank passed
JsonPath.HelpText: The amount of MozRank passed over all internal links with this term or phrase (on a normalized 10-point scale)

JsonPath.Title: External MozRank passed
JsonPath.HelpText: The amount of MozRank passed over all external links with this term or phrase (on a normalized 10-point scale)

JsonPath.Title: Image link
JsonPath.HelpText: A boolean value indicating whether the term or phrase is found in an image link. A value of 0 indicates a text anchor; a value of 1 indicates an image link.
